step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
Great job placing your hands on your abdomen. Prepare to inhale deeply and tighten your muscles.
You're doing well with the inhale and muscle tightening. Focus on visualizing the fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and muscle relaxation. Visualize pushing that fluid out as you complete this breath.
Good start to your second repetition. Remember to maintain a comfortable posture.
Well done keeping your hands on your abdomen. Get ready for the deep inhale and muscle engagement.
You're performing the inhale and muscle tightening effectively. Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Fantastic exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out to complete the exercise. Great work!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose, tighten your whole body, and visualize fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing and visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the excellent work!
